repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
Text not identified. A commentary on Nīti, with stanzas numbered from 1 to 78, containing two units:
47 folios by hand #1 = stanzas 1-77 (U1).
1 folio by hand #2 = stanzas 77-78 (U2).

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

supportDesc.foliation: Partial Tamil foliation. No foliation after f10 (leaves cut to size?).

collation.desc: 48 folios = TBC: Text & Commentary. 2 incomplete Tamil foliation (unblackened, later added) for the first folios. Ends with the beginning of stanza 77. 370 x 30 mm.
1 folio = TBC. No foliation. Verso blank. Starts with the end of stanza 77. 370 x 30 mm. Verso more dark = original outside page.

origin.origDate: Bundle not dated by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) nor by Cabaton (1912). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 12, no. 56.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 19r, no. 56.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Record created and revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, July 2022.
Revised and enlarged by Emmanuel FRANCIS after examination of the original manuscript. Version 2, October 2022.

body.ab:
Aṉāti-namaḥ
taruma miccinticcaiyālara veṉupi paciyiṉaralākkuc cattumīyāta vañciyarkaḷ tarumayaṟakiṭṭiṭṭu
māṟāta tuṉpamuṟu tēṭi nāṇi taṉilapiṟṟuṟṟu pēyākiya nanipakalaḷava cuttukkatanūlāṉ cin
tai melitaṟavaṟak keṭuppiṉṉōr kācumiṉṟi veṟumaiyiṉālē kāviṭai payiṭamariyaracai ko
ṇṭu poruḷ poruḷ eṉpa tatuṟṟa varaluḻaṉṟu palakavalai vaittuccattu mēlāṉavuṉa caraṇam niṉai
yāta kavataṉai tuyarkaḷē mīṟavampa ṉeṉaiyuṉa taruḷak kōttuṟṟa pērāka vaṉpu koṭukaruti yiraṭcikka
c ceytēyaraḷaveṉṟi yaruḷpurivāyē Aruveṉ poṟpuṟṟa tāyāṉ maṅkai marivayaṟṟuṟa pattiyāyiṉa meṉpatavaḷa
riya kaṟpuk kaṟpamēvāmal vantulakil maṟaivētam mutteṉṟittavāyāl moḻi natirataraṇamata kūpattait tappiyīṭaṟē
veṉṟu tiṉam Aṭiyaruk kōppittapōtā paranta viḷaiy kalāta viruḷiṭattiṟa cuttuṟeyōṭi maṇṭiyeḻum pukaipākka
ppatti tūṟātu vempuka ṉalleriyiṭatatiṟkuk kukūkūkuva veṉṟalaṟukaṇaiyāvu miṭukiṭara paṭṭuk kiyālerapa
miṉācavaku kuruciṭattiṟ paṭṭa nōvoṭu nērntariyayirukāttiṟṟait tū nīṭaraṇikoṇṭatorumutalōṉē = 1 = =
= 2 = =
77
pañcapulaṉkaḷil nāluyirka
korunañcun vantaṉa pōleṉak kuṟupantapavaṅkaḷ nivāraṇappaṭa varuḷa vāyē ~ neṇṭirai maṇṭiya kocaritti
ḷa vaṇṭalila vantu cōpamuṟṟuyir cintavumaṉṟoru cāpam niṟkaṟaka maruḷavōṉē – viṇṭala maṇṭala cōpaṉap pi
ṟiyacanta tamaṉpu ceyvār tamakkuṟuvem piṇituṉpavikāra maṟṟuḷa viṉaitīra veṉṟi purantaruḷa kāruṇip piṟacaṅkacuyaThe text stops short here.

piṟakā · 78 ·
Atipatiyāṉ pukaṭci y-eṉra v-āṟu · civakiṭāṣcam muṟṟum · nāṟāyaṉēṉ yeḻut=tu ·
blank page
